text:
[Verse 1]
Dancin' in the summer night
Stars above shining so bright
Feel the rhythm feel the beat
Under the moon our hearts meet

[Verse 2]
Waves are crashing on the shore
Music plays we ask for more
Laughter echoes through the air
Magic moments we all share

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight sky
We forget the reasons why
All the worries drift away
In this perfect hideaway

[Verse 3]
Footprints in the golden sand
Holding on to your warm hand
Lost in time no cares at all
In this night we stand tall

[Verse 4]
Fires burn a gentle glow
Whispers soft and movements slow
Hearts align under stars
Every dream takes us far

[Bridge]
We are endless we are free
In this night it's just you and me
Feel the breeze feel the flow
In this moment take it slow
title: Under the Moonlight Sky
